description: This notification is sent by the agent when
a mobility control path goes down.
This object represents the source address type.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtNotifyObjectSourceIPAddressType

description: This object represents the sourc address. The type
of this address is determined by the value of
cLMobilityExtNotifyObjectSourceIPAddressType.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtNotifyObjectSourceIPAddress

description: This object represents mobility source type.
unknown(0) - The source of the messages is unknown.
mobilityAgent(1) - The source of the messages is Mobility
Agent.
mobilityController(2) - The source of the messages is Mobility
Controller.
mobilityOracle(3) - The source of the messages is Mobility
Oracle.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtNotifyObjectSourceType

description: This object represents the mobility destination type.
unknown(0) - The destination of the messages is unknown.
mobilityAgent(1) - The destination of the messages is Mobility
Agent.
mobilityController(2) - The destination of the messages is
Mobility Controller.
mobilityOracle(3) - The destination of the messages is Mobility
Oracle.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtNotifyObjectDestinationType

description: This notification will be emitted by the SNMP agent
when successive CAPWAP/Mobility ping attempts to all the anchors on
Guest Wlan, denoted by cLWlanProfileName, fail and
all the anchors are conclusively down.

event.Summary: All guest WLAN anchors are down after ping failures

description: This object represents the profile name assigned
to this WLAN. The name assigned to a WLAN has to be
unique across all the WLANs on the controller.
An administrator can assign a meaningful
name that could later be used to refer a particular
WLAN on the controller. This object cannot be
modified when cLWlanRowStatus is 'active'.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-WLAN-MIB::cLWlanProfileName

description: This object specifies one instance of a WLAN policy on the
controller
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtWlanPolicyName

description: This notification will be emitted by the SNMP agent
when successive CAPWAP/Mobility and UDP ping to at least one anchor
on the Guest Wlan, denoted by cLWlanProfileName, is
restored and anchor is conclusively up.

event.Summary: One guest WLAN anchor is up after successful pings

description: This object represents the profile name assigned
to this WLAN. The name assigned to a WLAN has to be
unique across all the WLANs on the controller.
An administrator can assign a meaningful
name that could later be used to refer a particular
WLAN on the controller. This object cannot be
modified when cLWlanRowStatus is 'active'.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-WLAN-MIB::cLWlanProfileName

description: This object specifies one instance of a WLAN policy on the
controller
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-MOBILITY-EXT-MIB::cLMobilityExtWlanPolicyName
